content.html: If you drag an emoji family with a string size of 11 into an input with maxlength=10, one of the children will disappear.
content.value: If you drag an emoji family with a string size of 11 into an input with maxlength=10, one of the children will disappear.

content.html: People often talk about gender transition being like someone dying and being replaced with another person or version of that version but for me it mostly just felt like getting better from an illness. Emigrating to a distant country though? That feels like I died and replaced myself with a different person.
content.value: People often talk about gender transition being like someone dying and being replaced with another person or version of that version but for me it mostly just felt like getting better from an illness. Emigrating to a distant country though? That feels like I died and replaced myself with a different person.

content.html:
Behold "Glaze", a software tool that subtly alters the pixels in a piece of art online üé® ...

... in a way that isn't detectable by the human eye üëÄ ...

... but renders the image useless for training a visual AI. The AI can't detect the artists' style, and thus can't mimic it and copy it. ü§ñ ‚úñÔ∏è

It's item #1 in my weekly "Linkfest" newsletter here üì´ : https://buttondown.email/clivethompson/archive/linkfest-6-gps-on-the-moon-8-bit-jane-austen-and/

(Subscribe here! https://buttondown.email/clivethompson)
content.value: Behold "Glaze", a software tool that subtly alters the pixels in a piece of art online üé®  ...... in a way that isn't detectable by the human eye üëÄ  ...... but renders the image useless for training a visual AI. The AI can't detect the artists' style, and thus can't mimic it and copy it. ü§ñ ‚úñÔ∏è It's item #1 in my weekly "Linkfest" newsletter here üì´ : https://buttondown.email/clivethompson/archive/linkfest-6-gps-on-the-moon-8-bit-jane-austen-and/(Subscribe here! https://buttondown.email/clivethompson)

photo.alt: Screengrab from the academic paper describing Glaze. It shows pictures by three artists -- Karla Ortiz, Nathan Fowkes, and Claude Monet -- and how an AI can mimic their styles. Then it shows how the AI fails to mimic the styles when Glaze is used: The resulting artworks have been merged with the styles of Vincent Van Goh, Norman Bluhm, and Picasso, and no longer look like works by the original three artists

content.html: #ProjectWeirdLittleGuy #ScreenshotSaturday on a Sunday this time. Riot asked if we have weather like sandstorms in the game and I said "We can!" Plus I've done the first step for getting biomes working in the game which is updating the terrain shader to be able to blend between different texture sets based on biome data.
content.value: #ProjectWeirdLittleGuy #ScreenshotSaturday on a Sunday this time. Riot asked if we have weather like sandstorms in the game and I said "We can!" Plus I've done the first step for getting biomes working in the game which is updating the terrain shader to be able to blend between different texture sets based on biome data.

content.html:
Perched atop Baltimore's abandoned Westport Generating Station, I made one of my favorite surprise discoveries: A narrow gauge railroad used to deliver coal to the furnaces

See the gallery/history: https://www.abandonedamerica.us/baltimore-gas-and-electric
content.value: Perched atop Baltimore's abandoned Westport Generating Station, I made one of my favorite surprise discoveries: A narrow gauge railroad used to deliver coal to the furnacesSee the gallery/history: https://www.abandonedamerica.us/baltimore-gas-and-electric

photo.alt: A concrete corridor lined with railroad tracks. Black wooden coal cars sit on the tracks, stretching into the distance.

content.html: This is the problem. This is why your excuses don't matter. Because they see you playing the wizard game, and they think you're on their side. They think everyone is on their side cause everyone is playing the wizard game, that they're right, that Joanne is right, and that we're less than human, so they murder us.
content.value: This is the problem. This is why your excuses don't matter. Because they see you playing the wizard game, and they think you're on their side. They think everyone is on their side cause everyone is playing the wizard game, that they're right, that Joanne is right, and that we're less than human, so they murder us.

content.html:
Via Evil Hat Productions on the bird site:

Today the creators of Kids on Brooms are donating 100% of their profits to charities supporting trans people.

If you want to play a wizard school game, play this one. It's great.

Support trans people. Support creators who know #TransRightsAreHumanRights

#ttrpg
